item.title: Chinese A Lit: Key Changes for P1 in the 2021 New Syllabus
item.description:
Jiaxcuit //jiaxcuit.github.io/en/posts/p1-syllabus-changes/ -

Thank you for clicking on this blog post!

If you’re doing Chinese A Lit, then I assume you understand Chinese quite well. (And I hope you do😂) So here’s the link to the same post in Chinese (Simplified): 中文文学 2021 新大纲 P1 变化要点.

Any thoughts or comments are welcomed!

- //jiaxcuit.github.io/en/posts/p1-syllabus-changes/ -
